enabled.description: Enable initialization of the boundary cluster. Only true or false are allowed.
Enable Vault integration for database credentials. Only true or false are allowed.

secretEngine.description: Secret engine type. Only kv2 is supported.

replicas.description: Number of controller replicas. Must be an integer value.

config.description: Boundary controller configuration in HCL format.

enabled.description: Enable PodDisruptionBudget for controller pods. Only true or false are allowed.

minAvailable.description: Minimum number of pods that must be available during disruptions. Must be an integer value.

maxUnavailable.description: Maximum number of pods that can be unavailable during disruptions. Must be an integer value.

replicas.description: Number of worker replicas. Must be an integer value.

config.description: Boundary worker configuration in HCL format.

enabled.description: Enable LoadBalancer service for worker nodes. Only true or false are allowed.
Enable PodDisruptionBudget for worker pods. Only true or false are allowed.

minAvailable.description: Minimum number of pods that must be available during disruptions. Must be an integer value.

maxUnavailable.description: Maximum number of pods that can be unavailable during disruptions. Must be an integer value.
